name: template-toolkit-tag-pair
description: Highlight the matching tags in Perl Template Toolkit

colors.description: The color to highlight incomplete blocks (i.e. blocks that lack the start or end directive)
The color of the corresponding directive rendered next to the END tags

templateToolkitTagPair.general.languages.description: List of the languages for which this extension is activated

templateToolkitTagPair.highlight.target.description: Which part of the tag to highlight
enumDescriptions: Highlight the entire tag containing a directive that constitutes a block
Highlight only the directive that constitutes a block

templateToolkitTagPair.highlight.depthCo.description: Colors to highlight blocks in the order of depth (Repeated when depth > depthColors.length)

templateToolkitTagPair.correspondingDire.description: Whether to show the corresponding block-starting directive when you hover over the END tags
Whether to show the corresponding block-starting directive next to the END tags
enumDescriptions: Only when the corresponding directive is in a separate line
Only when the corresponding directive is vertically distant
